oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Show Boat Variety - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: RadiOzark transcription Show Boat Variety, part 1. Featuring Joe Brown (host), Charlie Ackerson (host) with side-man Fitzhugh Jones (name unconfirmed), Betty Bowers, the Jordanaires, June Carter and the Carter Sisters with Chet Atkins, Clifford Patterson, and Paul Mitchell and the Show Boat Band. Circa 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie Ackerson; Paul Mitchell; Show Boat Band; Betty Bowers; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Joe Brown) -- Theme -- Sponsorship opportunity message (Announcer) -- Joe Brown introduces 'Captain' Charlie Ackerson and Fitzhugh Sylvester Jones -- Comedy routine (Charlie Ackerson, Fitzhugh Jones) -- Hello! Ma Baby (Charlie Ackerson) -- Sponsorship opportunity message (Announcer) -- Charlie Ackerson introduces Betty Bowers -- What Is This Thing Called Love (Betty Bowers) -- Comedy routine (Charlie Ackerson, Fitzhugh Jones) -- Alexander's Ragtime Band (Charlie Ackerson) -- Sponsorship opportunity message (Announcer) -- Joe Brown and Charlie Ackerson introduce the Jordanaires -- I'm On My Way To Heaven Anyhow (The Jordanaires)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Show boat variety (Radio program); Siman, Si, 1921-1994; Ackerson, Charlie; Jordanaires (Musical group); Carter Sisters; Carter, Anita; Carter, Helen, 1927-1998; Carter, Maybelle, 1909-1978; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet
